name: Hyper Box
description: In Hyper Box you try to beat a bunch of platform levels in less than 30 seconds each by using the box rotation to your advantage, this is meant to be a very challenging yet rewarding experience as you improve at the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2GHz-processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Pretty much anything from year 2010+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A simple but challenging jumping based puzzle platformer. Refreshing and fun to play, and I'd definately reccomend it
I liked it.  Nothing less to say.
